return.title: Flexibility and Trust Every Step
return.subtitle: A clear return and exchange policy designed for your convenience.

conditions.title: Return Conditions
conditions.point1: You can return the product within 14 days from the date of receipt.
conditions.point2: The product must be in its original condition, unused, and in its original packaging.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.point1: Customized or specifically sized products cannot be returned.
exceptions.point2: Products damaged due to customer misuse cannot be returned.

process.title: Return Process
process.point1: Contact our customer service team to submit a return request.
process.point2: The amount will be refunded using the same payment method within 5 to 10 business days after product inspection.

exchange.title: Exchange Policy
exchange.description: Immediate exchange is allowed in case of a clear manufacturing defect or if a wrong product was sent by mistake. In such cases, Tashtiba gladly bears all shipping costs.
